column4: so I just ran a "killall esd" to get sound working in a particular program, and I'm noticing sound is working now in several programs it wasn't before... is there any good reason to run ESD, and if not, how to I just disable it so I don't have to deal with it when I reboot next?
thanks, I just made those changes, will reboot shortly... hope none of those goofed up what I just got working though... we'll see shortly
